des:
Save energy and money with free professionally installed PowerShift Smart Thermostats from NV Energy. Set your heating and cooling schedules and let the thermostat help you save on monthly power bills. It will learn your temperature preferences, make energy-saving adjustments and track your energy savings. PowerShift Smart Thermostats are Alexa enabled with intuitive voice command capability and come with a free mobile app.

 You can ask Alexa things like:
  
 · “Alexa, what is the temperature in the Bedroom?”
 · “Alexa, decrease my Bedroom temperature.”
 · “Alexa, increase my Bedroom temperature."
 · “Alexa, what is Bedroom set to?”
 · “Alexa, set Bedroom to 68 degrees”
 · “Alexa, set Bedroom mode to off."
 · “Alexa, set Bedroom mode to heat."
 · “Alexa, set Game Room mode to cool."
 · “Alexa, set Game Room mode to auto."
 · "Alexa, increase Game Room by 2 degrees"
 · "Alexa, decrease Game Room by 2 degrees"

If you have multiple thermostats in your home and have named them a handy name (such as Upstairs and Downstairs), you can say things like:

“Alexa, what is the temperature Upstairs?”

If you’ve set up groups, the PowerShift Smart Thermostat will also work with an assigned group name. For more information on groups, please visit: http://amzn.to/2965dCE

“Alexa, set the Game Room to 68 degrees”
